entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
